allDayBreakfast.title: All Day Breakfast
allDayBreakfast.description: Healthy and Delicious meals to start your day with energy.

panGrilledChickenBreast.name: Pan-Grilled Chicken Breast
panGrilledChickenBreast.description: Tender, juicy chicken breast, pan-grilled to perfection with a golden sear and seasoned with our signature herb blend. Served hot off the grill, it's crisp on the outside, succulent on the inside, and packed with flavor in every bite. Pair it with your choice of sides for a wholesome, protein-rich meal that's both healthy and satisfying.

freshBeanCoffee.name: Fresh Bean Coffee
freshBeanCoffee.description: Brewed from premium, freshly ground beans, our coffee is bold, aromatic, and full of character. Each cup is crafted with care—from bean to brew—delivering rich flavor, a smooth finish, and just the right kick to brighten your day. Whether you like it black, creamy, or iced, our fresh bean coffee is your daily dose of comfort and energy.

appleSummerSlawSalad.name: Delicious Apple Summer Slaw Salads
appleSummerSlawSalad.description: A refreshing twist on a classic! Our Apple Summer Slaw combines crisp green apples, shredded cabbage, and carrots, tossed in a light, zesty dressing with a hint of honey and lemon. It's crunchy, tangy, and just the right touch of sweet—perfect as a side, a light meal, or a sunny day pick-me-up.

summersSpecial.name: Summers Special
summersSpecial.description: Cool down and chill out with our hand-crafted Summer Special Drinks! From fruity refreshers to creamy chillers, each drink is made to beat the heat and boost your mood. Whether you're craving a zesty citrus cooler, a tropical smoothie, or an iced coffee with flair—we've got your perfect summer sip. Fresh, vibrant, and made with love—just what your sunny day ordered.
